cn.summary: AnyProxy 4.x版正在Beta中，欢迎试用 Ref：AnyProxy 4.x 文档
cn.featureCDesc: 多终端共享，可视化观察每个请求
cn.featureDDesc: 个性化处理规则，定制专属调试工具
cn.sampleCTitle: 为某个请求指定目标IP地址
cn.sampleDTitle: 把所有图片响应替换成本地图片

en.summary: AnyProxy is a fully configurable http/https proxy in NodeJS, which offers you the ablity to handle http traffic as you wish.
en.featureADesc: It's all javascript and easy to learn.
en.featureCDesc: Web based interface to view requests
en.featureDDesc: Make your own debugging tool by writing rule files
en.quickStartStepB: set proxy to 127.0.0.1:8001 on your browser or device
en.sampleBTitle: remove if-modified-since from http request header
en.sampleCTitle: assign a specified ip address for some requests
en.sampleDTitle: replace all image response by local one
en.otherFeatureA: Map file to local , filter your logs
en.otherFeatureBDesc: , help to test the performance of your app on poor network
en.otherFeatureC: Using AnyProxy as an npm module
en.otherFeatureCDesc: , to deploy your own debugging tools
